lead_paragraph: Several soldiers have been arrested after a video showed government troops killing about a dozen unarmed people on a rural road.
snippet: Several soldiers have been arrested after a video showed government troops killing about a dozen unarmed people on a rural road....

headline.main: Congo Opens Inquiry Over Video of Massacre It Had Derided as Fake
headline.print_headline: Congo Is Opening Inquiry Into Video of a Massacre
